trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> methods to provide access to output parameters, return values, and exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs é usada no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A>métodos para fornecer acesso aos parâmetros de saída, valores de retorno e exceções que são geradas pelo método que é chamado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: These are accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Eles são acessados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>Propriedades, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding a delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> events, you can examine this data and perform any additional post processing that is required.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando um delegado para manipular o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>eventos, você pode examinar esses dados e executar qualquer processamento de postagem adicional é necessário.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controle expõe vários eventos que você pode manipular para trabalhar com o objeto comercial subjacente várias vezes durante o ciclo de vida.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os eventos e associado <xref:System.EventArgs>classes e delegados de manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Evento | EventArgs | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente antes da instância do objeto comercial é criada. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente depois que a instância do objeto comercial é criada. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes que os dados são recuperados. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de uma inserção, atualização ou operação de exclusão é executada. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que os dados são recuperados. | ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre após a inserção, atualização ou operação de exclusão for concluída. | ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de um objeto comercial é destruído. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified output parameters and return value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando os parâmetros de saída especificado e o valor de retorno.

trans-unit.source: The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method.
trans-unit.target: O `returnValue` parâmetro pode ser qualquer objeto que é retornado por uma chamada para o método de dados do objeto comercial.

trans-unit.source: The `outputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: O `outputParameters` parâmetro é um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>coleção de pares de nome/valor que coincide com a assinatura do método e são transmitidos por referência.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a return value for the completed database operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa um valor de retorno para a operação de banco de dados concluída.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs of parameter objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>de pares de nome/valor de objetos de parâmetro.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified output parameters, return value, and exception.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando os parâmetros de saída especificado, retorna o valor e a exceção.

trans-unit.source: The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method.
trans-unit.target: O `returnValue` parâmetro pode ser qualquer objeto que é retornado por uma chamada para o método de dados do objeto comercial.

trans-unit.source: The `outputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: O `outputParameters` parâmetro é um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>coleção de pares de nome/valor que coincide com a assinatura do método e são transmitidos por referência.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The `exception` parameter is an <xref:System.Exception> exception that wraps any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control during a data operation.
trans-unit.target: O `exception` parâmetro é um <xref:System.Exception>exceção que encapsula todas as exceções geradas pelo método que é chamado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controle durante uma operação de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: If the exception is not handled by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> method, it is thrown by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control after the data operation returns.
trans-unit.target: Se a exceção não é tratada por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A>método, ele é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controlar após a operação de dados retorna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a return value for the completed database operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa um valor de retorno para a operação de banco de dados concluída.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs of parameter objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>de pares de nome/valor de objetos de parâmetro.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that wraps any internal exceptions thrown during the method call.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Exception>que encapsula todas as exceções internas lançadas durante a chamada do método.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows that are affected by the data operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de linhas afetadas pela operação de dados.

trans-unit.source: Use the AffectedRows value to verify that the expected number of rows was affected.
trans-unit.target: Use o valor de AffectedRows para verificar se o número de linhas esperado foi afetado.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the data operation.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas afetadas pela operação de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a wrapper for any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control during a data operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um wrapper para todas as exceções geradas pelo método que é chamado pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> controle durante uma operação de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> exception does not represent the actual exception that is thrown by the business object data method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>exceção não representa a exceção que é lançada pelo método de dados de objeto comercial realmente.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property to access the thrown exception.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade para acessar a exceção lançada.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> that wraps any exceptions thrown by the business object in its <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Exception>que encapsula as exceções geradas pelo objeto de negócios em seu <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was thrown by the business object has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma exceção foi acionada pelo objeto comercial foi tratada.

trans-unit.source: If the business object throws an exception, the ExceptionHandled property is set to `false` and the exception is wrapped by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto comercial lança uma exceção, a propriedade ExceptionHandled é definida como `false` e a exceção é encapsulada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler> object, you can check the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> property and handle the exception.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>do objeto, você pode verificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A>propriedade e o identificador de exceção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: If you handle the exception, set the ExceptionHandled property to `true` or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se você lidar com a exceção, defina a propriedade de ExceptionHandled `true` ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>controle lançará uma exceção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an exception thrown by the business object has been handled and should not be thrown by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma exceção lançada pelo objeto comercial foi tratada e não devem ser gerada pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains business object method parameters and their values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que contém parâmetros de método do objeto comercial e seus valores.

trans-unit.source: Any parameters that are passed to the business object method by reference are returned in the OutputParameters collection.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros que são passados para o método do objeto comercial por referência são retornados na coleção OutputParameters.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent the business object method parameters and their corresponding values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>de pares de nome/valor que representam os parâmetros de método do objeto de negócios e seus valores correspondentes.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets the return value that is returned by the business object method, if any, as an object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de retorno que é retornado pelo método de objeto de negócios, se houver, como um objeto.

trans-unit.source: The ReturnValue property is set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ReturnValue é definida <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The value is set to the return value of the business object method call, which is called using reflection.
trans-unit.target: O valor é definido como o valor de retorno da chamada de método business objeto, que é chamado por meio de reflexão.

trans-unit.source: If the business method returns no value (such as when the business object method returns `void`), the ReturnValue property evaluated to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o método de negócios não retorna nenhum valor (como quando o método do objeto comercial retorna `void`), a propriedade ReturnValue é avaliada como `null`.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the return value returned by the business object method; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the business object method returns no value.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o valor de retorno retornado pelo método de objeto de negócios; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, se o método do objeto comercial não retorna nenhum valor.
